title: 95/274/EC: Commission Decision of 10 July 1995 amending Decision 91/516/EEC establishing a list of ingredients whose use is prohibited in compound feedingstuffs
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 10 July 1995 amending Decision 91/516/EEC establishing a list of ingredients whose use is prohibited in compound feedingstuffs (Text with EEA relevance) (95/274/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Decision 91/516/EEC is hereby amended as set out in the Annex of this Decision.
This Decision shall apply from 1 June 1996.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 July 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 86, 6. 4. 1979, p. 30.
(2) OJ No L 281, 9. 10. 1991, p. 23.
ANNEX
Point 2 is replaced by the following:
'2. Hide treated with tanning substances, including its waste`.
